parameters.name: after
parameters.description:
A group ID to seek to. Groups prior to and including the specified
     *                          ID are excluded from the results and do not count towards `max`.
     *                          Useful for pagination. Commonly set to the `lastSeen` property from
     *                          a previous query.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description:
Maximum number of groups to return. This does not guarantee that
     *                          `max` groups are returned. It does guarantee that the number of
     *                          groups returned won't exceed `max`.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list (or array) of fields to show for each group.
     *                          Omitting this parameter or passing an empty value shows all fields.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description:
Keywords to limit groups on. Only groups where the group ID, group name (if set), or
     *                          description contain the specified keywords are returned.

operations.notes: Returns the complete list of groups in Swarm.

parameters.name: Group
parameters.description: Group identifier string.

parameters.name: Users
parameters.description:
An optional array of group users.
     *                          At least one of Users, Owners, or Subgroups is required.

parameters.name: Owners
parameters.description:
An optional array of group owners.
     *                          At least one of Users, Owners, or Subgroups is required.

parameters.name: Subgroups
parameters.description:
An optional array of subgroups.
     *                          At least one of Users, Owners, or Subgroups is required.

parameters.name: config[name]
parameters.description: An optional full name for the group.

parameters.name: config[description]
parameters.description: An optional group description.

parameters.name: config[emailFlags][commits]
parameters.description: Email members when a change is committed.

parameters.name: config[emailFlags][reviews]
parameters.description: Email members when a new review is requested.

operations.notes: Creates a new group in Swarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Group ID

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list (or array) of fields to show for each group.
     *                          Omitting this parameter or passing an empty value shows all fields.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Group ID

parameters.name: Users
parameters.description: An optional array of group users.

parameters.name: Owners
parameters.description: An optional array of group owners.

parameters.name: Subgroups
parameters.description: An optional array of group subgroups.

parameters.name: config[name]
parameters.description: An optional full name for the group.

parameters.name: config[description]
parameters.description: An optional group description.

parameters.name: config[emailFlags][commits]
parameters.description: Email members when a change is committed.

parameters.name: config[emailFlags][reviews]
parameters.description: Email members when a new review is requested.

operations.notes:
Change the settings of a group in Swarm.
               Only super users and group owners can perform this action.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Group ID.

operations.notes: Delete a group. Only super users and group owners can perform this action.
